testCase.name: Checkbox enables button on first click and disables on second click
error response from server for submitting order
handles error for scoops and toppings routes
disable order button if there are no scoops ordered
indicate if scoop count is non-int or out of range
displays image for each scoop option from server
Displays image for each toppings option from server
don't update total if scoops input is invalid
update scoop subtotal when scoops change
update toppings subtotal when toppings change
grand total grand total updates properly if scoop is added first
grand total grand total updates properly if topping is added first
grand total grand total updates properly if item is removed
Toppings header is not on summary page if no toppings ordered
